member.summary: Converts to its string format.

member.summary: Gets or sets index of this .

member.summary: Gets or sets name of this formatted as station_name:channel_name.

member.summary: Gets or sets station name component of this .

member.summary: Gets or sets the 2-character phase identifier for this .

member.summary: Gets or sets phase designation of this .

member.summary: Gets or sets nominal frequency of this .

member.name: T:Comtrade.ChannelMetadata
member.summary: Defines a minimal set of channel metadata for a COMTRADE config file.

member.name: F:Comtrade.ChannelMetadata.Name
member.summary: Channel name.

member.name: F:Comtrade.ChannelMetadata.SignalType
member.summary: Channel signal type.

member.name: F:Comtrade.ChannelMetadata.IsDigital
member.summary: Determines if channel is a digital.
member.remarks: Channel is assumed to be an analog if field is false.

member.name: T:Comtrade.ChannelMetadataSorter
member.summary: Defines a comparison class to property sort metadata.

member.name: M:Comtrade.ChannelMetadataSorter.Compare(Comtrade.ChannelMetadata,Comtrade.ChannelMetadata)
member.summary: Compares one metadata record to another.
member.returns: Comparison sort order of metadata record.

member.name: F:Comtrade.ChannelMetadataSorter.Default
member.summary: Default instance of the metadata record sorter.

member.name: T:Comtrade.Parser
member.summary: COMTRADE data file(s) parser.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the COMTRADE .

member.name: M:Comtrade.Parser.Finalize
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources before the object is reclaimed by .

member.name: M:Comtrade.Parser.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all the resources used by the object.

member.name: M:Comtrade.Parser.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Comtrade.Parser.OpenFiles
member.summary: Opens all COMTRADE data file streams.

member.name: M:Comtrade.Parser.CloseFiles
member.summary: Closes all COMTRADE data file streams.

member.name: M:Comtrade.Parser.ReadNext
member.summary: Reads next COMTRADE record.
member.returns: true if read succeeded; otherwise false if end of data set was reached.

member.name: P:Comtrade.Parser.Schema
member.summary: Gets or sets associated COMTRADE schema for this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Parser.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets COMTRADE data filename. If there are more than one data files in a set, this should be set to first file name in the set, e.g., DATA123.D00.

member.name: P:Comtrade.Parser.InferTimeFromSampleRates
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if time should be inferred from sample rates.

member.name: P:Comtrade.Parser.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets timestamp of current record.

member.name: P:Comtrade.Parser.Values
member.summary: Gets values of current record.

member.summary: Represents an action adapter that exports measurements on an interval to a COMTRADE formatted file that can be imported into other systems for analysis.

member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Comtrade.FileExporter.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes .

member.name: M:Comtrade.FileExporter.PublishFrame(GSF.TimeSeries.IFrame,System.Int32)
member.summary: Process frame of time-aligned measurements that arrived within the defined lag time.
member.param: of measurements that arrived within lag time and are ready for processing.
Index of within one second of data ranging from zero to frames per second - 1.

member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the .

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the from an existing configuration file name.
member.param: File name of configuration file to parse.

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.StationName
member.summary: Gets or sets free-form station name for this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.DeviceID
member.summary: Gets or sets free-form device ID for this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets version number of the IEEE Std C37.111 used by this .
member.exception: Only IEEE Std C37.111 version 1999 is supported by this implementation of the phasor data schema.

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.TotalChannels
member.summary: Gets total number of analog and digital channels of this .

member.summary: Gets total number of analog channels of this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.TotalDigitalChannels
member.summary: Gets total number of digital channels of this .

member.summary: Gets or sets analog channels of this .

member.summary: Gets or sets digital channels of this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.NominalFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets nominal frequency of this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.TotalSampleRates
member.summary: Gets total number of sample rates of this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.SampleRates
member.summary: Gets or sets sampling rates of this . A file of phasor data will normally be made using a single sampling rate, so this will usually be 1.

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.StartTime
member.summary: Gets or sets start timestamp of this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.TriggerTime
member.summary: Gets or sets trigger timestamp of this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.FileType
member.summary: Gets or sets file type of this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.TimeFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the multiplication factor for the time differential (timestamp) field in this .

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.DigitalWords
member.summary: Gets the total digital words for given number of digital values when the file type is binary.

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.BinaryRecordLength
member.summary: Calculates the size of a record, in bytes, when the file type is binary.

member.name: P:Comtrade.Schema.FileImage
member.summary: Gets the file image of this .

member.summary: Sample rate in Hertz (Hz).

member.summary: Last sample number at sample rate.

member.name: T:Comtrade.Writer
member.summary: COMTRADE data and config file writer.

member.name: M:Comtrade.Writer.CreateSchema(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Comtrade.ChannelMetadata},System.String,System.String,GSF.Ticks,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Double,System.Double,GSF.PhasorProtocols.LineFrequency,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new COMTRADE configuration .
member.param: Total data samples (i.e., total number of rows).
Determines if data file should be binary or ASCII - defaults to true for binary.
Time factor to use in schema - defaults to 1000.
Determines if the FRACSEC word digital definitions should be included - defaults to true.
member.remarks: This function is primarily intended to create a configuration based on synchrophasor data (see Annex H: Schema for Phasor Data 2150 Using the COMTRADE File Standard in IEEE C37.111-2010), it may be necessary to manually create a schema object for other COMTRADE needs. You can call the property to return a string that that can be written to a file that will be the contents of the configuration file.

member.name: M:Comtrade.Writer.WriteNextRecordAscii(System.IO.StreamWriter,Comtrade.Schema,GSF.Ticks,System.Double[],System.UInt32,System.Boolean,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Writes next COMTRADE record in ASCII format.
member.param: Values to write - 16-bit digitals should exist as a word in an individual double value, method will write out bits.
Determines if FRACSEC value should be automatically injected into stream as first digital - defaults to true.
FRACSEC value to inject into output stream - defaults to 0x0000.
member.remarks: This function is primarily intended to write COMTRADE ASCII data records based on synchrophasor data (see Annex H: Schema for Phasor Data 2150 Using the COMTRADE File Standard in IEEE C37.111-2010), it may be necessary to manually write records for other COMTRADE needs (e.g., non 16-bit digitals).

member.name: M:Comtrade.Writer.WriteNextRecordBinary(System.IO.Stream,Comtrade.Schema,GSF.Ticks,System.Double[],System.UInt32,System.Boolean,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Writes next COMTRADE record in binary format.
member.param: Values to write - 16-bit digitals should exist as a word in an individual double value.
Determines if FRACSEC value should be automatically injected into stream as first digital - defaults to true.
FRACSEC value to inject into output stream - defaults to 0x0000.
member.remarks: This function is primarily intended to write COMTRADE binary data records based on synchrophasor data (see Annex H: Schema for Phasor Data 2150 Using the COMTRADE File Standard in IEEE C37.111-2010), it may be necessary to manually write records for other COMTRADE needs (e.g., non 16-bit digitals).
